titlestmt.titleproper: Dordick (Johanna) collection of Los Angeles Opera Theater records
Finding Aid for the Johanna Dordick Collection of Los Angeles Opera Theater Records PASC-M.0321
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Courtney Dean, 2020.

p.date: Online finding aid last updated 2020 December 10.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-01-16 13:27:41 -0800.

did.unittitle: Johanna Dordick collection of Los Angeles Opera Theater records
did.physloc: Stored off-site. All requests to access special collections material must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. All requests to access special collections materials must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical objects belong to UCLA Library Special Collections. All other rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: CONTAINS UNPROCESSED AUDIOVISUAL MATERIALS: Audiovisual materials are not currently available for access and will require further processing and assessment. If you have questions about this material please email AskLSC@library.ucla.edu.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Johanna Dordick collection of Los Angeles Opera Theater records (Collection PASC-M 321). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collections are processed to a variety of levels depending on the work necessary to make them usable, their perceived user interest and research value, availability of staff and resources, and competing priorities. Library Special Collections provides a standard level of preservation and access for all collections and, when time and resources permit, conducts more intensive processing. These materials have been arranged and described according to national and local standards and best practices.

We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Problematic Content and Description in UCLA's Library Collections and Archives.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Johanna Dordrick (neÃÅe Elizabeth Patricia Robinson) was born in Thomasville, Georgia in the midst of the 20th century. She discovered she loved singing at an early age and has pursued that path ever since. Her career has taken various forms, mostly based around performance, music, and singing with the Los Angeles Opera Theater (LAOT).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of the personal donations of Johanna Dordick relating to the Los Angeles Opera Theater (originally named the Los Angeles Repertory Theater). Dordick founded Los Angeles Opera Theater in 1979 and served as the artistic director until her resignation in 1985. Los Angeles Opera Theater dissolved later that year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: budget outlines, public information and press clippings related to finances, ticket sales, contract outlines, administrative costs, accounts payable, balance sheets, donations received, projections, meeting notes, report to board of directors, fund planning analyses, personal financial notes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: Wiltern Theater records, ticket sales, legal documents, projections, ticket solicitations, fundraising assignments, personal notes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: contacts, case statements, appointment books, meeting notes, campaign plans.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: contracts, board information, bylaws, legal notifications, attorney correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: brochures for opera seasons, solicitations for membership and ticket sales.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes issues of: Opera/Musical Theatre Companies and Workshops in The United States and Canada, Opera News, Profile, Opera America, Los Angeles Times.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: advertisements, newspapers, magazines, calendar listings, articles, LAOT history, reviews.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: advertisements, press releases, reviews, articles, collected quotes, magazines, solicitations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: invitations, promotional materials, programs.

scopecontent.p: Includes: tickets, promotional material, programs, press clippings and reviews, photographs, slides, photographic negatives.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: CONTAINS UNPROCESSED AUDIOVISUAL MATERIALS: Audiovisual materials are not currently available for access and will require further processing and assessment. If you have questions about this material please email AskLSC@library.ucla.edu.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes cassette recordings of: Tosca, Madama Butterfly, La Boheme, unidentified productions Includes DVD recording of Der Rosenkavalier.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: CONTAINS UNPROCESSED AUDIO MATERIALS: Audio materials are not currently available for access and will require further processing and assessment. If you have questions about this material please email AskLSC@library.ucla.edu.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Thirty-eight audio recordings of various performances.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: Johanna Dordick's personal letters, drafts, personal photographs and slides, book with personal dedications in it.
